This high-quality Anvil t-shirt is pre-shrunk and 100% cotton, which makes it both comfortable and durable.

name: Fender '65 Deluxe Reverb Guitar Amp Speaker Cable Fargen Hot Mods Upgrade!
description:
Fargen Hot Mods Hi End replacement upgrade speaker cable for Fender '65 Deluxe Reverb Re-issue or similar guitar combo amp.

It's time to replace the poor quality stock speaker cable in your Fender amp…DUMP that plastic molded tone sucker for Our Fargen Custom Shop "Hot Mods" cable built with quality Evidence Audio Cable and heavy duty Nuetrik 1/4 right angle connector. This simple DIY upgrade can make a huge improvement in sustain, note balance and overall frequency response!

You will receive a custom Fargen Hot Mods cable that is 1FT long and will fit a Fender Deluxe reverb or similar combo amp.

This hand crafted Fargen custom shop "Hot Mods" cable uses the best quality audio components available. This premium hand crafted speaker cable uses Evidence Audio Siren II wire and a pro heavy duty quality Nuetrik 1/4 mono connector. 

We can choose to use any high end hook up and speaker cable we want for the Fargen Custom Shop products....and we choose Evidence Audio products for use in our Fargen Custom Shop Amplifiers, mods and accessories.

Hey...if Evidence audio cable is good enough for David Gilmour of Pink Floyd...it's good enough for us!!!!!!

name: Fender Champion 600 - Fargen "Hot Mods" Modified - New!
description:
This is a brand new Champion 600 that has the Fargen "Hot Mods" Blueprint installed for ultra killer blues tones.

This includes:

Fargen Super Sustain "Hot Mod" = Special recipe of custom components installed that improves  sustain by at least double.

Mercury Magnetics output transformer (over wound and built especially for the Fargen "Hot Mods")

Mercury Magnetics choke (built especially for the Fargen "Hot Mods"

Upgraded JJ 6V6 and 12AX7

2 way custom gain switch added

Fargen Custom Shop “Hot Mods” tag for you to install

One Year Fargen Factory limited warranty

options.name: Evidence Audio Custom "Hot Mods" Speaker Cable

name: Vox Night Train "Hot Mods" service package by Fargen
description:
Are you ready to have the glorious rich tone from you're Vox Night Train (NT-15)? Look no further…We have developed a proven upgrade modification program to unlock the true tone potential of this classic tube amp design and put it on par with vintage classics from the past.

After you send in your Vox Night Train for the upgrade In-House mod service...we turn your amplifier into a pro tone machine with the following:

*Install the complete Fargen Super Sustain Hot Mod (special blueprint recipe of custom components installed that improves sustain by at least double. (plate resistors, cathode resistors, signal path resistors, cathode bypass caps, EQ and SoZo tone caps

*Install Mercury Magnetics 2 x EL84 output transformer (over wound and built especially for the Fargen custom shop)

*Install Mercury Magnetics choke (built especially for the Fargen custom shop)

*Provide Fargen Custom Shop “Hot Mods” tag for you to install

*One Year Fargen Factory limited warranty

Let the pros at the Fargen Custom shop deliver you a killer amp that will give you amazing tones you will not find from a stock Vox Night Train.

Please contact us at info@fargenamps.com for shipping information and your appointment date once payment has been received in full.

name: Fender Deluxe Reverb - Fargen Hot Mods Modified - New!
description:
This is a brand new Fender Deluxe Reverb Re-issue (DRRI) with the Fargen "Hot Mods" professionally  installed and ready to go!

This includes a new Mercury Magnetics output transformer, Mercury Magnetics power supply choke, replacement of all critical signal path board components including, plate resistors, cathode resistors, cathode bypass caps and coupling. and tone caps + our normal channel tweed mod, Fargen "Hot Mods" Speaker upgrade

You can expect the amp to sound as good or better than an original 1965 Deluxe reverb times as much when we get done installing our Fargen "Hot Mods" Blueprinting.

Including:

Improved note detail/balance,
increased sustain,
lower noise floor,
smoother overdrive at lower volumes

name: Fender Blues Jr. "Hot Mods" service package by Fargen
description:
Are you ready to have the glorious rich tone from you're Fender Blues Jr.? Look no further…We have developed a proven upgrade modification program to unlock the true tone potential of this classic tube amp design.

After you send in your Fender Blues Jr. chassis for the upgrade In-House mod service...we turn your amplifier into a pro tone machine with the following:

name: Fender '65 Deluxe Reverb "Hot Mods" Tube Set Upgrade!
description:
Bring that sparkle and low end thump back with a new set of JJ tubes for your Fender Deluxe Reverb or DRRI

Details:

Everything you need to for a Fender Deluxe Reverb tune-up!
2 - 2000011 JJ Czechoslovakian ECC81/12AT7
4 - 2000000 JJ Czechoslovakian ECC83 /12AX7S 
1 - 2000010 JJ Czechoslovakian 5AR4/GZ34
2 - 2000011 JJ Czechoslovakian 6V6

*Power Tubes are matched

name: Fender Champion 600 - New DIY Fargen Hot Mods KIT!
description:
This is a Fargen DIY (DO IT YOURSELF) Hot Mod Champion 600 KIT:

Champion 600 schematic

Full parts list and the documentation sheet you will need to convert your Champion 600 into a Fargen FSS Hot Mod Champion 600.

Documentation sheet on how to install the front panel 2 way gain switch

Documentation sheet on how to install hum reduction mod.

9ea. Fargen custom shop resistors

3ea. SoZo Mustard Tone caps

2ea. bi-polar Nichicon bypass caps

1ea. 2 way mini toggle switch w/ cloth wire

2ea. #6 self tapping mounting screws with washers for new PS Choke.

Mercury Magnetics output transformer (over wound and built especially for the Fargen custom shop)

Mercury Magnetics choke (built especially for the Fargen custom shop)


Disclaimer!: You must have experience working with electronics and you must know how to solder. This is not a beginners kit and does not come with tech support!

name: Fender Deluxe Reverb "Hot Mods" service package by Fargen
description:
Are you ready to have the glorious rich tone from you're Fender Deluxe Reverb  or Reissue (DRRI)? Look no further…We have developed a proven upgrade modification program to unlock the true tone potential of this classic tube amp design.

After you send in your Fender Deluxe Reverb or DRRI chassis for the upgrade In-House mod service...we turn your amplifier into a pro tone machine with the following:

*Install the complete Fargen Super Sustain Hot Mod (special blueprint recipe of custom components installed that improves sustain by at least double. (plate resistors, cathode resistors, signal path resistors, cathode bypass caps, EQ and tone caps

*Install normal channel "50 's Tweed Jumper mod" This mod hops up the normal channel gain by 25% and then jumpers the channel so that it also feeds the Reverb And vibrato circuit...

*Install Mercury Magnetics output transformer (over wound and built especially for the Fargen custom shop)

*Install Mercury Magnetics choke (built especially for the Fargen custom shop)

*Provide Fargen Custom Shop “Hot Mods” tag for you to install

*One Year Fargen Factory limited warranty

Let the pros at the Fargen Custom shop deliver you a killer amp that will give you amazing tones you will not find from a stock Fender Deluxe Reverb

Please contact us at info@fargenamps.com for shipping information and your appointment date once payment has been received in full.
